data.title: Frederik X is proclaimed the new king of Denmark after Queen Margrethe II abdicates
data.meta_description: Thousands of people spontaneously break into the Danish national anthem outside Christianborg Palace after Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen proclaims the new king.
